description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，中共元老习仲勋的第二任妻子，中国共产党中央委员会总书记习近平的生母。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China, the second wife of the CCP elder Xi Zhongxun, and the mother of the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，曾任国务院副总理、中共中央书记处书记和全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the Communist Party of China, who served as Vice Premier of the State Council, Secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat, and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第五代最高领导人，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中国共产党中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: The fifth-generation paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋与齐心的长女。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Xi Zhongxun and Qi Xin.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋与齐心的次女。
description.en: The second daughter of Xi Zhongxun and Qi Xin.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋与齐心的次子。
description.en: The second son of Xi Zhongxun and Qi Xin.

description.zh-cn: 齐心的姐姐。
description.en: Qi Xin's elder sister.

description.zh-cn: 齐心的弟弟。
description.en: Qi Xin's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 齐心的父亲，曾任国民革命军军法处长、县长等职。
description.en: Qi Xin's father, who served as Director of the Military Justice Department of the National Revolutionary Army and county magistrate.

description.zh-cn: 齐心的母亲。
description.en: Qi Xin's mother.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥的第二任丈夫。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao's second husband.

description.zh-cn: 齐安安的丈夫。
description.en: Qi An'an's husband.

description.zh-cn: 齐云的丈夫。
description.en: Qi Yun's husband.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河北省保定市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Baoding City, Hebei Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间，由中国共产党领导的常规军队。
description.en: The regular army led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

zh-cn: 北平市立第一女子中学

description.zh-cn: 北京市的一所重点中学。
description.en: A key middle school in Beijing.

nodes.id: 抗日军政大学第一分校

zh-cn: 抗日军政大学第一分校
en: First Branch of the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University

description.zh-cn: 中国人民抗日军事政治大学在晋东南地区设立的分校。
description.en: A branch of the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University established in the southeast of Shanxi province.

en: Party School of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的干部培训机构。
description.en: A training institution for officials directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于陕西省延安市的一所综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Yan'an, Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任抗日军政大学校长。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who served as the president of the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古人民共和国前领导人，曾任蒙古人民革命党总书记、部长会议主席。
description.en: Former leader of the Mongolian People's Republic, who served as General Secretary of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party and Chairman of the Council of Ministers.

description.zh-cn: 1962年发生的一起政治案件，导致习仲勋等人受到长期审查和迫害。
description.en: A political case that occurred in 1962, leading to the long-term investigation and persecution of Xi Zhongxun and others.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动，对中国社会造成了深远影响。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong, which had a profound impact on Chinese society.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党前高级领导人，在文化大革命期间担任重要职务。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China who held important positions during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，为下放干部、知识分子等进行劳动改造和政治学习的场所。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, a place for re-education through labor and political study for demoted cadres and intellectuals.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席和总书记。
description.en: Former Chairman and General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the Communist Party of China, who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国在1950年代至1970年代间，组织城市知识青年到农村地区定居和劳动的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in China from the 1950s to the 1970s that sent urban educated youth to live and work in rural areas.

description.zh-cn: 齐心是习仲勋的第二任妻子。
description.en: Qi Xin was the second wife of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 齐云是齐心的姐姐。
description.en: Qi Yun is Qi Xin's elder sister.

description.zh-cn: 齐步是齐心的弟弟。
description.en: Qi Bu is Qi Xin's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 七七事变前夕，齐心考入北平市立第一女子中学（现北京一六一中学）。
description.en: On the eve of the Marco Polo Bridge Incident, Qi Xin was admitted to the Beiping Municipal First Girls' High School (now Beijing 161 Middle School).

relationships.target: 抗日军政大学第一分校

description.zh-cn: 1943年冬天，时任抗大校长何长工写信向习仲勋介绍齐心，促成了他们的相识与婚姻。
description.en: In the winter of 1943, He Changgong, then president of the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University, wrote a letter to Xi Zhongxun introducing Qi Xin, which led to their acquaintance and marriage.

description.zh-cn: 与丈夫习仲勋一同接待了来华访问的蒙古领导人泽登巴尔夫妇。
description.en: Together with her husband Xi Zhongxun, she received the visiting Mongolian leader Yumjaagiin Tsedenbal and his wife.

description.zh-cn: 因反党小说《刘志丹》案，习仲勋遭到清洗，被隔离审查并下放洛阳。
description.en: Due to the Anti-party novel Liu Zhidan case, Xi Zhongxun was purged, placed under isolated investigation, and sent down to Luoyang.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，康生将齐心列入500人黑名单，导致她受到审查。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Kang Sheng placed Qi Xin on a blacklist of 500 people, which led to her being investigated.

description.zh-cn: 因丈夫习仲勋的问题，齐心在文化大革命期间受到审查，并在五七干校劳动了7年。
description.en: Due to her husband Xi Zhongxun's problems, Qi Xin was investigated during the Cultural Revolution and spent 7 years in labor at a May Seventh Cadre School.

description.zh-cn: 习近平在“上山下乡”运动中，作为知识青年下放至陕北梁家河村插队。
description.en: During the Down to the Countryside Movement, Xi Jinping was sent down to Liangjiahe Village in northern Shaanxi as an educated youth.

description.zh-cn: 习近平从乡下逃回北京后，齐心为保护家庭，被迫向领导举报了儿子，导致习近平被送往“少管所”劳动改造。
description.en: After Xi Jinping fled back to Beijing from the countryside, Qi Xin, in order to protect her family, was forced to report her son to the authorities, which led to Xi Jinping being sent to a juvenile detention center for labor reform.

description.zh-cn: 在齐心写信求助后，周恩来作出批复，安排齐心母子见到了被关押的习仲勋，并帮助解决了其生活困难。
description.en: After Qi Xin wrote a letter asking for help, Zhou Enlai gave instructions to arrange for her and her children to meet the imprisoned Xi Zhongxun and helped solve their living difficulties.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命结束后，为帮助丈夫习仲勋复出而四处奔走“上访”。
description.en: After the end of the Cultural Revolution, she traveled extensively to petition for her husband Xi Zhongxun's political rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央组织部部长的胡耀邦为帮助习仲勋复出的齐心指引方向，建议她求助王震。
description.en: Hu Yaobang, then head of the CCP's Organization Department, guided Qi Xin in her efforts to rehabilitate Xi Zhongxun, suggesting she seek help from Wang Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 受齐心所托，向邓小平为习仲勋说情，促成了其政治复出。
description.en: At the request of Qi Xin, he interceded with Deng Xiaoping on behalf of Xi Zhongxun, which led to his political rehabilitation.
